benchmark_details.name: Ordered CommonGen
benchmark_details.overview: A benchmark designed to evaluate the compositional generalization and instruction-following abilities of LLMs by measuring ordered coverage of generated sentences in response to specified concept orders.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the capability of LLMs to generate sentences that follow explicit instructions regarding the order of concepts.

data.source: CommonGen-lite dataset and instruction templates from FLAN.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the percentage of concepts correctly generated in specified order and overall diversity of outputs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores in Ordered Rate indicate better adherence to specified order of concepts.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Apache License 2.0 for FLAN templates, MIT License for CommonGen.
